page.description: General Settings: System Settings can be started from the launcher. Here you can configure your display, mouse, keyboard other common options.
Personalization: Customize your themes, download wallpapers from the Internet and beautify your desktop.
Desktop Settings: Set which icon(s) is/are shown on your desktop, choose a style for your dock panel, and customize the hot zones on your screen.
User Accounts: Add or remove user accounts, set user password, enable and disable automatic login, and set user's picture.
Startup Applications: Enter "Default Applications", click on the tab named "Autostart", and add, delete or modify items for startup applications.
Keyboard shortcuts: The predefined hotkeys are customized to suit your needs and are easy to remember.
Power Management: There are balanced, power saver and high performance modes. It is recommended that you select performance mode when you are watching a movie or playing games.
